long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension will fade user's flair based off of which subreddit links at the top have been faded. It will only change whether the user's flair is faded for you.

The source code can be found here: http://pastebin.com/j7KWU6PV
